alert.note: Alert for Darke; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 3:55PM EDT until May 21 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Shelby County in west central Ohio... Darke County in west central Ohio... Northwestern Miami County in west central Ohio... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Madison, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Versailles, Covington, Bradford, Ansonia, New Madison, Webster, Wayne Lakes, Russia, Gettysburg, Osgood, North Star, Hollansburg, Rossburg, Palestine, Yorkshire, Union Corners, Polo, Darke County Airport and State Route 47 at US Route 127. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
